pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'RStudio' Addin for Editing a 'data.frame' // An 'RStudio' addin for editing a 'data.frame' or a 'tibble'. You can delete, add or update a 'data.frame' without coding. You can get resultant data as a 'data.frame'. In the package, modularized shiny app codes are provided. These module are intended for reuse across applications.
